data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 569,614 lost in Sarthe that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sarthe, Pays de la Loire, France
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Sarthe hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Sarthe, Pays de la Loire, France by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Sarthe, Pays de la Loire, France to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Sablé-sur-Sarthe
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Sablé-sur-Sarthe, Pays de la Loire, France.
Pour your Spirit out on the 576,700 citizens of Sarthe, Pays de la Loire, France, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Sarthe, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.focus_label: Sarthe, Pays de la Loire, France
data.section_summary:
the county of Sarthe, Pays de la Loire, France has a population of 576,700.

We estimate Sarthe has 7,086 people who might know Jesus, 352,664 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 216,950 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Sarthe access to a Bible in their own language.
